Description: Book of the Dead of Ankhhep; frame 1; red and black ink; black outline vignettes at top; full colour vignettes to right.
Curator's comments: Published: Mosher, Catalogue of the Books of the Dead in the BM: The Papyrus of Hor, (2001), p.92 n.98-9&109-10, p93 n.111-2, p.95 n.178.
See M. Mueller-Roth, F. Weber in R. Lucarelli et al (ed.), Heraugehen am Tage: Gesammelte Schriften zum altaegyptischen Totenbuch (SAT 17; Wiesbaden: Harrassowitz 2012), p. 117-18.

Mosher, Malcom Jr. 2016. The Book of the Dead, Saite through Ptolemaic periods : a study of traditions evident in versions of texts and vignettes (SPBD Studies), vol. I (BD Spells 1-15) and II (BD Spells 16, 18-30), Charleston.
Bibliographic references: Quirke 1993 / Owners of funerary papyri in the British Museum (18)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (57076) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/57076)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: delaminating Black ink Red ink Pigment (flaking, loss) Backed: linen Mount Details: Sandwich: glass (warped) Sandwich: board Binding: cloth Object Priority: B Mount Priority: B Overall Condition: C Curatorial condition comment: fair
Acquisition notes: Lot 171 in auction of residue of d'Athanasi collection
